sys_script_include.name: GetUserEmail

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_c72b7bce83e96210066b11b6feaad305
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>public</access><active>true</active><api_name>x_1624486_employee.GetUserEmail</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description/><mobile_callable>false</mobile_callable><name>GetUserEmail</name><sandbox_callable>false</sandbox_callable><script><![CDATA[var GetUserEmail = Class.create();
GetUserEmail.prototype = Object.extendsObject(AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

    getEmail: function () {
        var userId = this.getParameter('sysparm_user_id'); // receives sys_id
        var userGR = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
        if (userGR.get(userId)) { // use .get(sys_id)
            return userGR.email + '';
        }
        return '';
    }

});
]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2025-05-18 09:51:24</sys_created_on><sys_id>c72b7bce83e96210066b11b6feaad305</sys_id><sys_mod_count>5</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetUserEmail</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Employee Onboarding" source="x_1624486_employee">d2865e3983212210066b11b6feaad3ce</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Employee Onboarding">d2865e3983212210066b11b6feaad3ce</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_c72b7bce83e96210066b11b6feaad305</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2025-05-18 10:54:43</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
